name: What's Up
description: This plugin allows you to display events from an .ics source as an agenda with previous, current, and upcoming events on your website.

features.1: Uses a shortcode, making it versatile
features.2: Ignores content in pre HTML tags
features.3: Can be used in the sidebar
features.4: Can be configured for HH:MM or AM/PM time display
features.5: Display past, present, and future events
features.6: Can use local .ics file or a remote .ics URL
